title: From cricket fever to blend of 'Bhojpuri Nights' and Hindu temples, how Indians aid Guyana's booming economy
description: From cricket fever to blend of 'Bhojpuri Nights' and Hindu temples, how Indians aid Guyana's booming economy Guyana gives that home vibe to visitors from India, and the Indianness is quite palpable in every corner of Georgetown. What adds to the Indian ambience is life on the bustling streets, mostl...
